info.name: DuckDuckGo Logo
info.description: New DuckDuckGo text version logo, redesigned to match the elegant yet minimalist style of our favorite search engine. Theme based on Googlify.
info.additionalInfo: -- Get more userstyles from me! -- You can buy me a ☕️ by using the Donation button :) --------------------------------- This userstyle works great with dark version of DuckDuckGo, just disable and re-enable to update items display if you encounter issues :) --------------------------------- Please report bugs and/or make new features suggestions! Keywords: firefox, duckduckgo, deepdark, logo, yandex, google, search, bing, lycos, wikipedia, modern, minimal, flat, dark, black, material, design, chrome, wiki, clean, light, wide, style, dark, n0x, nox, duckduckgo, navigation
